name: participant-transfer
label: Manage Participant Transfer
description: Gear to manage participant transfers between centers
author: NACC

dry_run.description: Whether to do a dry run

apikey_path_prefix.description: The instance specific AWS parameter path prefix for apikey

database_mode.description: Whether to lookup identifiers from dev or prod database

enrollment_project.description: The enrollment project flywheel path (group/project) which contain pending transfer information

participant_id.description: The PTID of the participant to be transferred

datatypes.description: Comma-delimited list of datatypes to be transferred

sender_email.description: The source email to send the transfer completion notification or error report

target_emails.description: Comma-delimited list of destination emails to send the notification to
